name: Cuby's Quest - Jumping Game
description:
Cuby's out for the day treasure hunting with the kids when the unthinkable happens - they mysteriously get taken!

Cuby must set out on a wild adventure over many levels and do battle with crazy enemies, traps and bosses to rescue them.

---------------

Cuby's Quest is a mix of old school platformer action and puzzle solving. Run, jump, shoot, swim, ride vehicles, avoid crazy traps and enemies, break and push crates.

Collect coins, power-ups and treasure through 3 different Worlds, tons of levels, hidden bonus rooms and thrilling boss battles to save your missing kids!

Can you find all the hidden secrets in Cuby's Quest?

FEATURES:

• Three vast worlds
• Loads of challenging levels
• Stunning HD graphics
• Fluid smooth controls and physics
• Crazy enemy monsters
• Boss battles
• Cool power-ups
• Story driven game play
• Hidden areas, items and easter eggs

Download now 100% FREE.
